put.summary: Change the number of voters of a [CommitteeSession].

200.description: Committee session number of voters changed successfully

get.summary:
Get a list of all elections, without their candidate lists and
a list of the current committee session for each election

post.summary: Create an election. For test usage only!
Uploads election definition, validates it, saves it to the database, and returns the created election

Uploads election definition, validates it and returns the associated election data and
a redacted hash, to be filled by the administrator.

get.summary:
Get election details including the election's candidate list (political groups),
its polling stations and the current committee session

post.summary: Get the apportionment for an election

412.description: Election apportionment is not yet available

get.summary: Get a list of all [CommitteeSession]s of an election
Download a generated PDF with election results
Download a generated EML_NL 510 XML file with election results
Download a zip containing a PDF for the PV and the EML with election results
Get a list of all [PollingStation]s for an election
Get election polling stations data entry statuses
Check whether the application is initialised (an admin user exists + has logged in at least once)

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only show events since the specified timestamp

get.summary: Lists all users that appear in the audit log

200.description: Audit log list of all users

get.summary: Get data entry differences to be resolved

200.description: Data entry differences to be resolved

404.description: No data entry with differences found

post.summary: Resolve data entry differences by providing a `ResolveDifferencesAction`

422.description: JSON error or invalid data (Unprocessable Content)

get.summary: Get accepted data entry errors to be resolved

200.description: Data entry with errors and warnings to be resolved

404.description: No data entry with accepted errors found

post.summary: Resolve accepted data entry errors by providing a `ResolveErrorsAction`

422.description: JSON error or invalid data (Unprocessable Content)

post.summary: Save a data entry for a polling station

parameters.name: entry_number
parameters.description: Data entry number (first or second data entry)

422.description: JSON error or invalid data (Unprocessable Content)

delete.summary: Delete an in-progress (not finalised) data entry for a polling station

parameters.name: entry_number
parameters.description: Data entry number (first or second data entry)

post.summary: Claim a data entry for a polling station, returning any existing progress

parameters.name: entry_number
parameters.description: Data entry number (first or second data entry)

post.summary: Finalise the data entry for a polling station

parameters.name: entry_number
parameters.description: Data entry number (first or second data entry)

422.description: JSON error or invalid data (Unprocessable Content)

put.summary: Update the user's account with a new password and optionally new fullname

post.summary: Login endpoint, authenticates a user and creates a new session + session cookie

200.description: The logged in user id and user name

post.summary: Logout endpoint, deletes the session cookie

200.description: Successful logout, or user was already logged out
The current user name and id

AbsoluteMajorityReassignedSeat.description: Contains information about the enactment of article P 9 of the Kieswet.

pg_assigned_seat.description: Political group number which the residual seat is assigned to

pg_retracted_seat.description: Political group number which the residual seat is retracted from

CandidateNominationResult.description:
The result of the candidate nomination procedure.
This contains the preference threshold and percentage that was used.
It contains a list of all chosen candidates in alphabetical order.
It also contains the preferential nomination of candidates, the remaining
nomination of candidates and the final ranking of candidates for each political group.

chosen_candidates.description: List of chosen candidates in alphabetical order

political_group_candidate_nomination.description: List of chosen candidates and candidate list ranking per political group

preference_threshold.description: Preference threshold percentage and number of votes

ClaimDataEntryResponse.description: Response structure for getting data entry of polling station results

CommitteeSessionNumberOfVotersChangeRequ.description: Committee session number of voters change request

DataEntry.description: Request structure for saving data entry of polling station results

client_state.description: Client state for the data entry (arbitrary JSON)

data.description: Data entry for a polling station

DifferencesCounts.description: Differences counts, part of the polling station results.

fewer_ballots_count.description: Number of fewer counted ballots ("Er zijn minder stembiljetten geteld. Hoeveel stembiljetten zijn er minder geteld")

more_ballots_count.description: Number of more counted ballots ("Er zijn mr stembiljetten geteld. Hoeveel stembiljetten zijn er meer geteld?")

no_explanation_count.description: Number of no explanations ("Hoe vaak is er geen verklaring voor het verschil?")

other_explanation_count.description: Number of other explanations ("Hoe vaak is er een andere verklaring voor het verschil?")

too_few_ballots_handed_out_count.description: Number of fewer ballots handed out ("Hoe vaak is er een stembiljet te weinig uitgereikt?")

too_many_ballots_handed_out_count.description: Number of more ballots handed out ("Hoe vaak is er een stembiljet te veel uitgereikt?")

unreturned_ballots_count.description: Number of unreturned ballots ("Hoe vaak heeft een kiezer het stembiljet niet ingeleverd?")

ElectionApportionmentResponse.description: Election apportionment response, including the seat assignment, candidate nomination and election summary

ElectionDetailsResponse.description:
Election details response, including the election's candidate list (political groups),
its polling stations and the current committee session

ElectionListResponse.description:
Election list response

Also includes a list of the current committee session for each election.
Does not include the candidate list (political groups) to keep the response size small.

ElectionStatusResponse.description: Election polling stations data entry statuses response

ElectionStatusResponseEntry.description: Election polling stations data entry statuses response

finished_at.description: Time when the data entry was finalised

first_entry_progress.description: First entry progress as a percentage (0 to 100)

second_entry_progress.description: Second entry progress as a percentage (0 to 100)

ElectionSummary.description: Contains a summary of the election results, added up from the votes of all polling stations.

differences_counts.description: The differences between voters and votes

political_group_votes.description: The summary votes for each political group (and each candidate within)

ErrorReference.description: Error reference used to show the corresponding error message to the end-user

ExtraInvestigation.description: Extra investigation, part of the polling station results ("B1-1 Extra onderzoek")

ballots_recounted_extra_investigation.description:
Whether ballots were (partially) recounted following the extra investigation
("Zijn de stembiljetten naar aanleiding van het extra onderzoek (gedeeltelijk) herteld?")

extra_investigation_other_reason.description:
Whether extra investigation was done for another reason than an unexplained difference
("Heeft het gemeentelijk stembureau extra onderzoek gedaan vanwege een andere reden dan een onverklaard verschil?")

Fraction.description: Fraction with the integer part split out for display purposes

HighestAverageAssignedSeat.description: Contains the details for an assigned seat, assigned through the highest average method.

pg_assigned.description: The list of political groups with the same average, that have been assigned a seat

pg_exhausted.description: The list of political groups that are exhausted, and will not be assigned a seat

pg_options.description: The list of political groups with the same average, that have not been assigned a seat

selected_pg_number.description: The political group that was selected for this seat has this political group number

votes_per_seat.description: This is the votes per seat achieved by the selected political group

LargestRemainderAssignedSeat.description: Contains the details for an assigned seat, assigned through the largest remainder method.

pg_assigned.description: The list of political groups with the same remainder, that have been assigned a seat

pg_options.description: The list of political groups with the same remainder, that have not been assigned a seat

remainder_votes.description: The number of remainder votes achieved by the selected political group

selected_pg_number.description: The political group that was selected for this seat has this political group number

ListExhaustionRemovedSeat.description: Contains information about the enactment of article P 10 of the Kieswet.

full_seat.description: Whether the removed seat was a full seat

pg_retracted_seat.description: Political group number which the seat is retracted from

PoliticalGroupCandidateNomination.description:
Contains information about the chosen candidates and the candidate list ranking
for a specific political group.

other_candidate_nomination.description: The list of other chosen candidates, can be empty

pg_name.description: Political group name for which this nomination applies

pg_number.description: Political group number for which this nomination applies

pg_seats.description: The number of seats assigned to this group

preferential_candidate_nomination.description: The list of chosen candidates via preferential votes, can be empty

updated_candidate_ranking.description: The updated ranking of the whole candidate list, can be empty

PoliticalGroupSeatAssignment.description: Contains information about the final assignment of seats for a specific political group.

full_seats.description: The number of full seats assigned to this group

meets_remainder_threshold.description: Whether this group met the threshold for largest remainder seat assignment

pg_number.description: Political group number for which this assignment applies

remainder_votes.description: The remainder votes that were not used to get full seats assigned to this political group

residual_seats.description: The number of residual seats assigned to this group

total_seats.description: The total number of seats assigned to this group

votes_cast.description: The number of votes cast for this group

PoliticalGroupStanding.description:
Contains the standing for a specific political group. This is all the information
that is needed to compute the apportionment for that specific political group.

full_seats.description: The number of full seats this political group got assigned

meets_remainder_threshold.description: Whether the remainder votes meet the threshold to be applicable for largest remainder seat assignment

next_votes_per_seat.description: The number of votes per seat if a new seat would be added to the current residual seats

pg_number.description: Political group number for which this standing applies

remainder_votes.description: The remainder of votes that was not used to get full seats (does not have to be a whole number of votes)

residual_seats.description: The current number of residual seats this political group got assigned

votes_cast.description: The number of votes cast for this group

PollingStationResults.description:
PollingStationResults, following the fields in Model Na 31-2 Bijlage 2.

See "Model Na 31-2. Proces-verbaal van een gemeentelijk stembureau/stembureau voor het openbaar
lichaam in een gemeente/openbaar lichaam waar een centrale stemopneming wordt verricht,
Bijlage 2: uitkomsten per stembureau" from the
[Kiesregeling](https://wetten.overheid.nl/BWBR0034180/2024-04-01#Bijlage1_DivisieNa31.2) or
[Verkiezingstoolbox](https://www.rijksoverheid.nl/onderwerpen/verkiezingen/verkiezingentoolkit/modellen).

differences_counts.description: Differences counts ("3. Verschil tussen het aantal toegelaten kiezers en het aantal getelde stembiljetten")

political_group_votes.description: Vote counts per list and candidate (5. "Aantal stemmen per lijst en kandidaat")

number_of_votes.description: Preference threshold as a number of votes

percentage.description: Preference threshold as a percentage (0 to 100)

chunks.description: Array holding the hash chunks as text

redacted_indexes.description: Indexes of chunks that will be empty, sorted

SaveDataEntryResponse.description: Response structure for saving data entry of polling station results

SeatAssignmentResult.description:
The result of the seat assignment procedure. This contains the number of seats and the quota
that was used. It then contains the initial standing after full seats were assigned,
and each of the changes and intermediate standings. The final standing contains the
number of seats per political group that was assigned after all seats were assigned.

SeatChange.description: Records the political group and specific change for a specific residual seat

SeatChangeStep.description:
Records the change for a specific seat, and how the standing is once
that seat was assigned or removed

SumCount.description:
Contains a summary count, containing both the count and a list of polling
stations that contributed to it.

SummaryDifferencesCounts.description: Contains a summary of the differences, containing which polling stations had differences.

User.description: User object, corresponds to a row in the users table

VotersCounts.description: Voters counts, part of the polling station results.

poll_card_count.description: Number of valid poll cards ("Aantal geldige stempassen")

proxy_certificate_count.description: Number of valid proxy certificates ("Aantal geldige volmachtbewijzen")

total_admitted_voters_count.description: Total number of admitted voters ("Totaal aantal toegelaten kiezers")

VotesCounts.description: Votes counts, part of the polling station results.

blank_votes_count.description: Number of blank votes ("Aantal blanco stembiljetten")

invalid_votes_count.description: Number of invalid votes ("Aantal ongeldige stembiljetten")

total_votes_cast_count.description: Total number of votes cast ("Totaal aantal getelde stemmen")

votes_candidates_count.description:
Number of valid votes on candidates
("Aantal stembiljetten met een geldige stem op een kandidaat")

YesNo.description: Yes/No response structure for boolean questions with separate yes and no fields.
